title: Around the NFC in 48 Minutes: 2022 Preview Edition
itunes:title: Around the NFC in 48 Minutes: 2022 Preview Edition
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal go around the entire NFC conference in 48 minutes. The heroes jump right in with the NFC South (7:12), followed by the NFC East (22:21), next hitting the NFC North (38:27), and finally finishing out the show with the NFC West (51:51).

Note: timecodes approximate

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
